0:
server:
  enable:
    debug:
      server: true
  listen:
    address: 'http://0.0.0.0:8000'
service:
  alertmanager:
    address: http://alertmanager-operated.observability.svc.cluster.local:9093
  kubernetes:
    address: ''
    inCluster: true
    tls:
      caFile: ''
      crtFile: ''
      keyFile: ''
1:
server:
  enable:
    debug:
      server: true
  listen:
    address: 'http://0.0.0.0:8000'
service:
  alertmanager:
    address: http://alertmanager.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:9093
  kubernetes:
    address: ''
    inCluster: true
    tls:
      caFile: ''
      crtFile: ''
      keyFile: ''

provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"

0:
acl url_discovery path /.well-known/caldav /.well-known/carddav
http-request redirect location /remote.php/dav/ code 301 if url_discovery
option http-keep-alive
timeout server 120000ms

1:
ops=(
"db:add-missing-primary-keys"
"db:add-missing-indices"
"db:add-missing-columns"
"files:cleanup"
)
grey="\e[1;30m"
reset="\e[0m"
green="\e[1;32m"
red="\e[1;31m"
for op in "$${ops[@]}" ; do
  echo -e "$${grey}Running php occ $op $reset"
  su www-data -s /usr/local/bin/php -- occ $op && echo -en "$green" || echo -en "$red"
  echo -e "Finished php occ $op $reset"
done &&
echo -e "$${grey}Running php occ maintenance:repair --include-expensive $reset"
su www-data -s /usr/local/bin/php -- occ maintenance:repair --include-expensive && echo -en "$green" || echo -en "$red"
echo -e "Finished php occ maintenance:repair --include-expensive $reset"
while :; do /cron.sh; done
